Nerangs.ab: ka panǰag weh bēd yazišn ardā fraward ǰud az gāhānbār ud srōš tā abārīg yā̊ vīsāδa ō gōwišn ka gāhānbār ud srōš bēd nē gōwišn agar ardā farward padiš ka yaōždātą guft pas zōt ud rāspīg aṣ̌əm vohū sē guftan I frauuarāne ud hāuuanə̄e ud sāuuaŋhə̄e ud raθβąm tā gyāg ahurahe mazdā̊ raeuuatō xᵛarənaŋᵛhatō aməšanąm spəṇtanąm aṣ̌āunąm frauuašinąm tā nabānazdištanąm frauuašanąm xšnaoϑra tā sar guftan ka panǰag ī gāhānīg bēd gāθābiiō tā sar guftan zōt yaθā ahū vairiiō yō ātrauuaxšō rāspīg aθā ratuš kardan hamrāspīg yaθā ahū vairiiō yō zaōtā zōt aϑā ratuš kardan zōt ud rāspīg ahurəm mazdąm raēuuaṇtəm xᵛarənaŋᵛhaṇtəm yazamaide aməṣ̌ā spəṇtā huxšaϑrā huδā̊ŋhō yazamaide frauuaṣ̌aiiō yazamaide yā̊ vīsāδa āuuaiieiṇti hamaspaϑmaēdaēm paiti ratūm tā. nəmaŋha ka panǰag ī gāhānīg bēd gāθā spəṇtā tā sar gōwišn barsom abar barsomdān nihišn skūrag ī zōhr abar gīrišn zōhr bē nigerišn aṣ̌əm vohū sē guftan

"When it is (a performance during) the Five Good Days, a service for Ardā Fraward except for Gāhānbār or Srōš, he has to recite the text until the additional yā̊ vīsāδa. When it is a ceremony for Gāhānbār or for Srōš, then he has not to recite this text. If the frauuaṣ̌is are mentioned (in the šnūman), then, when he has said yaōždātą, then the zōt and the rāspīg recite three aṣ̌əm vohū, then the frauuarāne. and the section hāuuanə̄e and the section sāuuaŋhə̄e and the section raθβąm. until (the šnūman) ahurahe mazdā̊ raeuuatō xᵛarənaŋᵛhatō aməšanąm spəṇtanąm aṣ̌āunąm frauuašinąm OD nabānazdištanąm frauuašanąm xšnaoϑra until the end. When they are the Five Days of the Gāθās, they should say gāθābiiō until the end. Then the zōt should say yaθā ahū vairiiō yō ātrauuaxšō and the rāspīg should answer aθā ratuš. The same rāspīg should say: yaθā ahū vairiiō yō zaōtā. The zōt should answer: aϑā ratuš. The zōt and the rāspīg should recite togeher: ahurəm mazdąm raēuuaṇtəm xᵛarənaŋᵛhaṇtəm yazamaide aməṣ̌ā spəṇtā huxšaϑrā huδā̊ŋhō yazamaide frauuaṣ̌aiiō yazamaide yā̊ vīsāδa āuuaiieiṇti hamaspaϑmaēdaēm paiti ratūm until nəmaŋha. When they are the Five Days of the Gāθās, they should recite the section gāθā spəṇtā. He has to put the barsom on the barsomdān, take the skūrag for the zōhr and gaze at the zōhr. They should recite three aṣ̌əm vohū."
